bindings.name: songs
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.nameKana, c.nameIndex, c.artist, c.series, c.minBPM, c.maxBPM FROM c WHERE c.series = {{ '0': 'DDR 1st', '1': 'DDR 2ndMIX', '2': 'DDR 3rdMIX', '3': 'DDR 4thMIX', '4': 'DDR 5thMIX', '5': 'DDRMAX', '6': 'DDRMAX2', '7': 'DDR EXTREME', '8': 'DDR SuperNOVA', '9': 'DDR SuperNOVA2', '10': 'DDR X', '11': 'DDR X2', '12': 'DDR X3 VS 2ndMIX', '13': 'DanceDanceRevolution (2013)', '14': 'DanceDanceRevolution (2014)', '15': 'DanceDanceRevolution A', '16': 'DanceDanceRevolution A20', '17': 'DanceDanceRevolution A20 PLUS' }}[{series}] ORDER BY c.nameIndex, c.nameKana
